subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Byeong-Hun An beat the Clemson senior Ben Martin, 7 and 5, in the 36-hole final Sunday at Southern Hills in Tulsa, Okla.
snippet: Byeong-Hun An beat the Clemson senior Ben Martin, 7 and 5, in the 36-hole final Sunday at Southern Hills in Tulsa, Okla.
